column1: # The 1940 total has been adjusted by 0.01 compared to the sheet figure to match the sum of the months.
# The January 1942 reading is recorded as corrected for snow, and has been retained.
# The February, April, and December 1942 readings are notes as being considerably adjusted, and have been omitted.
# The 1945 total has been adjusted by 0.01 compared to the sheet figure to match the sum of the months.
# The January 1955 reading is recorded as being from Driffield Airfield, and has been omitted.
# The June 1956 reading is partially estimated, and has been retained.
# There is a confusing comment on the 1940s sheet to say that the gauge moved 1/2 mile north in July 1945.
# But this is not reflected in later grid references or church directions or elevations (or the location given in MIDAS).
# Such a move would put the gauge in the vicinity of Langtoft Mill TA006680, elevation 450 ft.
# The station continued until 1988 according to MIDAS.
